description: Welcome to Yorkson Creek—one of Langley’s most desirable communities! This beautifully maintained 3 bed, 2.5 bath townhome features a bright open main floor with hardwood, granite counters, solid wood cabinetry, heated bathroom floors, gas stove, and a new central HVAC system including A/C! Enjoy a cozy gas fireplace, gas BBQ hookup, and modern fixtures throughout. The tandem garage includes a workshop + storage, and the private backyard is perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The complex offers a clubhouse with gym and a children’s play area. Unbeatable location—walk to schools, parks, sports facilities, shopping, and transit, with quick access to Carvolth Exchange & Hwy 1. A move-in-ready home offering quality, comfort, and incredible convenience in Yorkson Creek!
